text: The Blue Max is a 1966 British Irish World War I drama movie directed by John Guillermin and starring George Peppard, James Mason, Ursula Andrews, Jeremy Kemp, Harry Towb, Karl Michael Vogler, Anton Diffring, Peter Woodthorpe, Loni von Friedl, Derek Newmark, Derren Nesbitt. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1966 drama movies Category:1966 war movies Category:British drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies directed by John Guillermin Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about aviation
title: The Blue Max
